headline: Should You Invest in Palantir Technologies (PLTR)?
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge All Cap Growth Strategy” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the second quarter, growth stocks led the stock market to rebound from tariff uncertainty. The benchmark Russell 3000 Growth Index performed better as risk-on sentiment took hold, rising […]

headline: Goldman Sachs Reaffirms Synopsys (SNPS) Buy Rating Amid Ansys Merger Uncertainty
summary: Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) ranks among the best software stocks to buy right now. In a research note released on August 22, Goldman Sachs reaffirmed its Buy rating on Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) with a $700 price target. Although the firm anticipates that Synopsys will produce in-line underlying results, it advised caution regarding possible volatility associated with the […]
